project1.title: Nutshell-muntjac
project1.description: This was a project encompassing everything our group had learned so far using html, css, scss, javascript, jquery, webpack, and firebase
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, Jquery, scss, webpack, and firebase

project2.title: Sorting hat
project2.description: This solo project is a simple app that takes a name into a form and prints it to the dom in the form of a card. it randomly selects one of the 4 houses from harry potter and assigns it to them
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Pants Culottes Group Project
project3.description: This was a group assignment where u worked with 3 others to create a site showing and selling culotte pants.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Sports Roster
project4.description: A full CRUD app built from the ground up using React. This app displays a roster of players on a sports team and allows them to be created, updated, and deleted. This app also includes google authentication
project4.technologiesUsed: Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, SASS, React, and Firebase

project5.title: Capstone: Gamer Log
project5.description: A full CRUD app built from the ground up using React. This app displays a roster of players on a sports team and allows them to be created, updated, and deleted. This app also includes google authentication
project5.technologiesUsed: Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, SASS, React, and Firebase
